summary: This was my very first cosplay, it was somewhere between the 16 or 17 of April 2018, tbh I’m not really proud of it but I wanted...
caption:
This was my very first cosplay, it was somewhere between the 16 or 17 of April 2018, tbh I’m not really proud of it but I wanted to share it with you guys anyway. The costume was all handamade by mum and my aunt. I hope you’ll like it <3

Love, Momoko

tags: fantastic beats and where to find them
summary: Trigger and spoiler warning for the cog movie
body:
Trigger and spoiler warning for the cog movie

I feel soo bad for leta after knowing her backstory. But there is a similarity there:

- She was conceived while her mom was under the imperius curse right?

- basically her mom never gave consent and she was definetly not born out of love.

- weren’t the circumstances with voldermorts birth the same?

- Isn’t it speculated that that is why voldemort doesn’t know love

- we als also know that her dad sure as fuck didn’t love her

- soo? Was she the same? Did she have difficulty feeling love? Is that why newt (and possibly theseus) were so important to her?

- was she smart and capable enough to not let that seep into her personality or did it do damage but on the inside

- i feel like leta was in alot of pain and nobody knew… i just love her soo much 😥😥😥😥


Please talk to me about leta and how lovely she was and also if i am right?

blog.name: hemavvls
blog.title: Don't know
blog.description: honestly here for fan art and edits

body:
Is it just me…..

Or anybody else feels like there’s so many hardcore Hermione fans who kinda ignore her flaws……( like being bossy, nagging, lack of social skills…. I mean she is not the perfect Mary Sue character like she is portrayed in majority of the fics) …… because she was played be the gorgeous Emma Watson…. Like it is common to overlook a character’s flaw when they are pretty because that’s the mentality of people sort of…

May be its me… But I think that people would have stanned her less if she was portrayed by an actress who was not classically beautiful or who was a person of color…

PS: I love Hermione but I acknowledge that she has her flaws

PPS: also I love Emma Watson and this is post is not about hating on her

summary:
Draco: If Granger and Weasley were about to be killed and you could save only one of them, who would it be?
Harry: Ron. Hermione...
body:
Draco: If Granger and Weasley were about to be killed and you could save only one of them, who would it be?
Harry: Ron. Hermione would want me to save him
Draco: Weasley would want you to save Granger
Harry: But I'm too scared of angry Hermione to leave her alive and grieving Ron

summary: So the guy I’m dating is a very casual Harry Potter fan. When I say casual I mean he hasn’t read the books and, as of last...
body:
So the guy I’m dating is a very casual Harry Potter fan. When I say casual I mean he hasn’t read the books and, as of last night, he had watched the movies once when they came out +15 years ago. Yet he made the effort to go to a “Pottercon” last weekend. An actual convention you pay for.

The past couple of days discussions as to why I wouldn’t go have been had. And it made me and my friends very self-aware of our relationship to the franchise. We are the opposite of casual fans. We read the books as they came out, we were obsessed, we have read them many, many times and will continue to do so for the rest of our lives. We have watched the movies, and we have seen JKR consistently destroy her own franchise (no, this is not a debate, she has and that’s that).

We all agreed that an event like the aforementioned Pottercon was of no interest to us because we are just tired and weary fans. WE HAVE FORGOTTEN THE TASTE OF BREAD, THE SOUND OF TREES, THE SOFTNESS OF THE WIND. We have been so intensely involved with Harry Potter that just going to a place where people run around dressed like wizards and witches for a day just doesn’t cut it for us anymore.

So we sat down and thought about WHAT type of talks/events would actually get our asses to a Pottercon. What would make us pay our hard earned money and invest out limited and precious time. And ooh by, we came up with interesting talks:

- HOW JK ROWLING SINGLE-HANDEDLY DESTROYED HER OWN FRANCHISE AND PERSONALLY RUINED MY LIFE FOREVER (a 5 hour TedTalk by my dear friend @ralkm​ - there will be a lot of angry yelling, considered yourself warned)
- Post-talk rehab group for recovering potterheads (ran by me).
- How Harry Potter changed children’s literature forever and helped cement Young Adult as a literary genre and popularized the Fantasy genre for the mainstream. 
- Analyzing magic politics: why wizards implemented an isolationist policy, and what consequences it had in relation to muggles and science.
- The wizarding world and how they construct nationalistic ideas.
- A treaty of the neuropsychology of magic: exploring how magic, emotions and neurological processes are intrinsically connected.
-> What does this mean for disabled people with cognitive, speech of mobility impediments.
-> What’s the relation between magic and mental health


ADD YOUR OWN.

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Rose Weasley, Louis Weasley, Albus Potter, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!

Feel free to ask me to draw stuff

summary: Joking - Sirius Black x Male! reader - Part 1
body:
Joking - Sirius Black x Male! reader - Part 1

Part 1 - Part 2

Read Spanish ver. here

It was a new year at Hogwarts. it was Sirius’ fourth year there and, telling the truth, he didn’t expect anything new. Apart from his dear   friends James, Remus and Peter, he felt like nobody truly knew him.

When  everyone had arrived, like always, all the first year students were  assigned to their houses. After that, Dumbledore made an announcement:

Dumbledore - I  know this doesn’t usually happen, but I have something to tell you.  We’ll have a new student. His powers appeared for the first time this  summer and he knows nothing about the magic world, but due to his age  and his academic results at the muggle school, we’ve decided that it  will be better if he goes directly to fourth year so he can get used to  this faster.Please, (Y/n), come here for a moment.

(Y/n), following Dumbledore’s instructions, he put on the Sorting Hat to know which house was he in:

Sorting Hat - Mmmm, interesting… this boy has talent. He would be an awesome Ravenclaw, definitely… Bt he would match in Slytherin, there’s no doubt of that. But now that I think about it, maybe Hufflepuff would be the right house for him. He looks like a kind person. I don’t know what to say.

(Y/n) - Shut up and choose! We don’t have all day, god!

Sorting Hat  - Don’t talk to me like that, have some respect. Well, at least I can see you’re brave. You’ll have problems here since you’re new, that for sure, but you still decided to come here. All right, I’ve decided. Gryffindor!

(Y/n) smiled and ran to the table were all his new classmates were. He sat next to one that looked nice:

(Y/n) - Hey! My name is (Y/n) D'Hiver. And you are…

Sirius  - I’m Sirius Black, nice to meet you. Let’s be good friends! Probably you’ll find some lessons difficult at first but, if you need help, feel free to ask me. Anything you need, eh? Don’t be ashamed, you won’t bother me! ANYTHING I think it’s cool that there are new students! Do you know the Hogwart’s Houses work? If you don’t, I don’t mind telling you.

(Y/n) - Thank you, but it won’t be necesary. Dumbledore already told me. you really enjoy helping, right? In that case, I’m counting on you.

After saying that, (Y/n) smiled, half relieved and half happy, and Sirius blushed when he saw that unexpected beautiful smile.

~♤~♡~◇~♧~

Once they were at Gryffindor’s common room, Sirius presented (Y/n) to his best friends:

Sirius - Guys! Look! This is (Y/n).

(Y/n) -  Hi, pleased to meet you. I just arrived here and I don’t really understand this stuff, but I hope we can be good friends.

James - I’m James, and these are Remus and Peter. don’t worry, if you need anything we’ll help you.

(Y/n) - Sirius told me the same. Are y'all in Hogwarts that kind?

Remus - Yes, usually. Slytherin is the exeption.

Sirius - They aren’t that bad. They just don’t think like us.

James - Yes, that’s right. They think in themselves. That’s what they think.

(Y/n) - Please, stop. You’re making Sirius unconfortable.

After that, they stopped. They could bother each other, but they were friends after all, and they didn’t want to hurt him.

(Y/n) - Sirius? Why did you react that way? What’s in your mind? I don’t know much about magic, but I can try to help you.

Sirius - It’s nothing. All my family went to Slytherin, so it’s not nice to hear that all the time. But the thing is they’re actually right.

(Y/n) - Are they that bad?

Sirius - Well, I don’t know anymore. I don’t think my brother is mean…

After saying that, Sirius stopped talking and he looked to the big watch that was on the wall.

Sirius - Oh, god! It’s already too late!We should go to sleep or we’ll be punished!

(Y/n) - Ok… I’m actually really tired. I need to rest for a bit.

And like that, (Y/n)’s first night at Hogwarts started, and the most incredible year in his life.

blog.name: xxseverus-snapexx
blog.title: Jk Rowling Critical
blog.description: I’m done with Harry Potter. It’s been a good 10 years but I can’t do this anymore. There are better things out there.

summary: How can you be a terf and like Snape, one of the most trans coded characters of all time?? Think much?
body: How can you be a terf and like Snape, one of the most trans coded characters of all time?? Think much?

body:
BOOK HELP

I saw on tumblr once a photo someone had posted of an edition of Harry Potter that was cream and gold. I think it was an international version, Eastern European maybe. I can’t remember, but I wanted to try and find a copy, only I’ve lost the photo of it I saved! I can’t remember the original user, either, so if you’ve seen it or know what I’m talking about PLEASE message me!!!

title: After Effects
body:
by Mira_A_Henss

Just a peek into how our favorite characters are doing after the war…

Words: 3633, Chapters: 9/23, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Harry Potter, Hermione Granger, Ron Weasley, Draco Malfoy, Ginny Weasley, Fred Weasley, George Weasley
  • Relationships: Hermione Granger/Ron Weasley, Harry Potter/Ginny Weasley, Arthur Weasley/Molly Weasley
  • Additional Tags: headcannons
